Description: The following statement contains a magic number: while (true) {  	var listener = new HttpListener ();  	var randomPortNumber = Random.Next (1025' 65535);  	listenerAddress = string.Format ("http://localhost:{0}/"' randomPortNumber);  	listener.Prefixes.Add (listenerAddress);  	try {  		listener.Start ();  		listener.Stop ();  		listener.Close ();  	} catch {  		continue;  	}  	break;  }
